tags: it doesnt matter if you do or dont ship them
summary: Okay not to get in the weeds too much here but the people who ship Jon and Daenerys because they “didn’t know they were related...
body: Okay not to get in the weeds too much here but the people who ship Jon and Daenerys because they “didn’t know they were related so it’s fine they didn’t INTEND to partake in incest” are the same ones who bash Jon and Sansa because “they were raised as siblings and are actually still related so that’s gross how could they have a relationship!!” My personal opinions on the ships are irrelevant, I’m just tired of the hypocrites pulling out different arguments for essentially the same thing

reblog.comment: Okay not to get in the weeds too much here but the people who ship Jon and Daenerys because they “didn’t know they were related so it’s fine they didn’t INTEND to partake in incest” are the same ones who bash Jon and Sansa because “they were raised as siblings and are actually still related so that’s gross how could they have a relationship!!” My personal opinions on the ships are irrelevant, I’m just tired of the hypocrites pulling out different arguments for essentially the same thing

blog.name: waking-dreams-of-harmony
blog.title: Headcanon is the new reality...
blog.description:
Hi there! My name is Ellie! Welcome to my tumblr!  Just thought I'd add a few things to know about me and my blog! If my url gives you any clues, at the heart of this tumblr, I'm a proud Harmony shipper through and through. And while I do still reblog HHR and Dan and Emma content (and I always will) you will find that the majority of my focus has shifted to Jonerys (Jon x Daenerys from Game of Thrones). And while you might have to do a little deep blogging to find my reblogs on these, I also ship--both passionately and casually--Cesare x Lucrezia, Mulder x Scully, Lizzington for a while until tptb started to mess with it, Baker x Lawson (Bawson), all the Sense8 ships though Kalagang is my #1, Clint x Natasha (Clintasha), Jane x Thor (Fosterson), Darcy x Loki (Tasertricks), Darcy x Steve (Shieldshock), Kili x Tauriel (Kiliel), Superman x Wonder Woman (Superwonder), and more than I have space for or the memory to list. 
I do my best to tag every post so that if something is your notp, it's nsfw, or it's triggering, you can blacklist it. That said, if you follow me and there is something that you need tagged in order to make it a happy place for you to explore, come into my inbox and let me know :) You will also see a lot of politically charged reblogs in support of women, the queer/gender-queer and trans community, BLM, Muslims, POC, Jewish people, the mentally ill, and austistic people. I'm strongly pro choice, pro inter-sectional feminism, and refuse to call the angry cheeto currently living in the white house president. If anything like that offends you, this might not be the right blog for you.
Last little few things to throw out there: I'm 35, I plan to adopt at least 4 cats (or more) at some point and be that cat lady everyone's always whispering about, and I tend to greet and converse with everyone I meet like an overeager puppy. 
Whew! Sorry for the long intro folks! Please enjoy your time here, and remember, you're always welcome to come in and say hi!

summary: Daenerys never wanted to become her father and those assholes took one of her greatest fears and forced her to live it and now...

blog.name: mynameismyth
blog.title: No One is Alone
blog.description: I'm Emily and I'm addicted to fictional people and places. Multifandom.

summary: i don't thing d&d misandertood dany's motivations, i think this is martin's ending and that's why d&d run away after the finale
question: i don't thing d&d misandertood dany's motivations, i think this is martin's ending and that's why d&d run away after the finale
answer:
I’m going to be honest with you. I may be making a fool of myself as the books haven’t bee released yet. But I’m going to lay this out anyway.

No this is not going to be GRRM ending.

Do I think Jon is going to kill Dany? Sadly, yes. I don’t think they would have had this in the show if GRRM had not outlined this for them.

Do I think Dany is going to burn King’s Landing? Yes I do. Is it going to be completely come from out of the blue? No. Is it going to be completely needless and unwarranted? After the city has surrendered? Is Dany really going to just flip a switch and burn the entire city, innocent men, women, and children for absolutely no reason. NO fucking way in hell.

GRRM is not going to abandon Dany’s perspective an and inner though processes either. There is going to be proper build up. Something that makes sense to her narrative and story arc.

Give me a break. D&D were completely lazy with Dany’s character throughout the entire show, not just this season alone. They never once brought up Dany’s longing for home and family. They always had her framed like she was focused on the Iron Throne just for the want of power. They never delved deep into her wants and wishes for a normal simple life.

And this ending for her made no sense to her character arc, even from a show perspective. If it really was the Iron Throne corrupting her in the end, why did she needlessly burn an entire city after it surrendered?

I’ll tell you why. Because D&D needed to turn her into an all black character with no hope for redemption in the span of 1 episode. They needed to turn her into a cartoon disney villain because Jon had to kill her in the end. And they couldn’t make poor precious Jon Snow out to be anything but an all white moral character. (Which in the books, he is already a grey character and may come back from the dead even darker.)

In the books this will play out completely different all because GRRM does understand both Dany and Jon.

(I’ll not go into how I believe Dany will burn King’s Landing BEFORE going north with Jon to fight the White Walkers, because that’s a whole other rant.)

blog.name: adreamofspring
blog.title: the queen we chose
blog.description:
leah. mostly just creating, gushing

over emilia clarke or daenerys targaryen

then occasionally bitching about got

emilia’s charity | justice for daenerys

mobile header by cottaterra

summary: “I am the blood of the dragon, Daenerys Targaryen reminded herself as she turned her face away. She pressed her lips together...
body: “I am the blood of the dragon, Daenerys Targaryen reminded herself as she turned her face away. She pressed her lips together and hardened her heart and rode on toward the gate. “Most of Ogo’s riders fled,” Ser Jorah was saying. “Still, there may be as many as ten thousand captives.” Slaves, Dany thought. Khal Drogo would drive them downriver to one of the towns on Slaver’s Bay. She wanted to cry, but she told herself that she must be strong. This is war, this is what it looks like.”

Khal Drogo would drive them downriver to one of the towns on Slaver’s Bay. She wanted to cry, but she told herself that she must be strong. This is war, this is what it looks like.”
